title.native: ソードアート・オンライン オルタナティブ ガンゲイル・オンライン
title.romaji: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online
title.english: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online

description:
The story follows Karen Kohiruimaki, a 183-centimeter-tall (6-foot-tall) college student who's insecure about her height, and is bad at dealing with people in the real world. She enters the world of Gun Gale Online with her avatar, Ren, who is less than 150 centimeters (5 feet) tall and wears all pink. She meets a beautiful, brown-skinned female player who goes by Pitohui. They hit it off, but one day Pitohui pressures her to participate in "Squad Jam," a team battle royale variation of the Bullet of Bullets tournament.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sigsawa)

Keiichi Sigsawa is a Japanese light novel author most notable for his work in [Kino's Journey](https://anilist.co/manga/30399/Kinos-Journey-The-Beautiful-World/), [Allison](https://anilist.co/manga/37086/Allison/), [Lillia and Treize](https://anilist.co/manga/37091/Lillia-to-Treize/), and [Sword Art Online Alternative Gun Gale Online](https://anilist.co/manga/100858/Sword-Art-Online-Alternative-Gun-Gale-Online/). He loves to travel, ride his motorcycle, and is a self-professed gun maniac. He mentions [Galaxy Express 999](https://anilist.co/anime/1491/Galaxy-Express-999/) and the works of [Hayao Miyazaki](https://anilist.co/staff/96870/Hayao-Miyazaki) as some of his primary influences.

Yousuke Kuroda is a Japanese screenwriter. He is affiliated with Studio Orphee and serves as the inside director (board of directors member).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.

Yousuke Kuroda is a Japanese screenwriter. He is affiliated with Studio Orphee and serves as the inside director (board of directors member).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDGKZdgRlP__KOCgC58WeWA/featured) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/reo_peko/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xoxleoxox) | [Website](https://www.reona-reona.com/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/intl-pt/artist/2SIBY7Jwq1kYng12Zguo3C) 

A Japanese female pop singer under the label SACRA MUSIC, who was a finalist of the 2017 SACRA MUSIC audition. She debuted as "Elsa Kanzaki" (a character in Sword Art Online) on July 4, 2018 with the character mini-album ELZA and as "ReoNa" on August 29, 2018 with the single SWEET HURT.

__Current Residence:__ Nerima, Tokyo, Japan
__Doujin Circle:__ WordGear

Kawahara Reki graduated from the Aoyama Gakuin University.

[Official Website](http://wordgear.sblo.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kunori)

[Official Website ](https://www.aoieir.com/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/eir_ruru) | [YouTube ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ7B1oCEDT_d4c9XTtChX7w) | [Instagram ](https://www.instagram.com/aoieir/) | [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/artist/18moNotPmBWa2YZtRnIoZ3?autoplay=true)

Aoi Eir is a Japanese pop singer signed to SME Records. She was discovered through Nico Nico Douga video sharing network. Like other Nico Nico Douga artists, not much of her personal information is revealed.   

Eir has loved singing since she was a child, at high school period, she sung in a band she had formed. After graduating from high school, she gave up her music career but continued performing publicly. Her impressive and beautiful voice are easily recognizable and she has been selected to sing the closing song for TV animation “Fate/Zero” which was released as her debut single called “MEMORIA” on October 19, 2011.

**Height:** 155 cm (5'1")

**[Website](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/) | [Profile (SMA)](https://www.sma.co.jp/s/sma/artist/441?ima=0000#/news/0) | [Profile (SMA VOICE)](http://smavoice.jp/s/sma03/artist/45?ima=5736) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomori_kusunoki)**

A Japanese voice actress who is currently affiliated with the Sony Music Artists agency. She made her voice acting debut in 2017, and in the same year she was cast in her first main role as Kirara, the heroine of the Japanese mobile game _Kirara Fantasia_. 

In September 2022, [Tomori announced her diagnosis with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS) affecting her joints](https://www.kusunokitomori.com/info/archive/?id=546582), which limits her ability to engage in physically demanding activities such as dancing. [It was announced on Love Live!’s website at the same time](https://www.lovelive-anime.jp/news/01_1248.html) that she would be graduating from the role of [Setsuna Yuuki](https://anilist.co/character/132796/Yuki-Setsuna) in March 2023, with [Coco Hayashi](https://anilist.co/staff/124857) replacing her in the role.

**Non-Anime Roles:**
- [Vice](https://anilist.co/character/277198) - Alchemy Stars (VG)
- [Kanade Yoisaki](https://anilist.co/character/249636) - Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku (VG)
- Viper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Seattle](https://anilist.co/character/197197), [I-58](https://anilist.co/character/228624), Glasgow - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Aunn Komano](https://anilist.co/character/145527) - Touhou Cannonball (VG)
- Vanessa - Cytus II (VG)
- [Ruka Kayamori](https://anilist.co/character/321897) - Heaven Burns Red (VG)
- [Firefly](https://anilist.co/character/349493) - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)

[Official Website ](https://www.aoieir.com/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/eir_ruru) | [YouTube ](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ7B1oCEDT_d4c9XTtChX7w) | [Instagram ](https://www.instagram.com/aoieir/) | [Spotify ](https://open.spotify.com/artist/18moNotPmBWa2YZtRnIoZ3?autoplay=true)

Aoi Eir is a Japanese pop singer signed to SME Records. She was discovered through Nico Nico Douga video sharing network. Like other Nico Nico Douga artists, not much of her personal information is revealed.   

Eir has loved singing since she was a child, at high school period, she sung in a band she had formed. After graduating from high school, she gave up her music career but continued performing publicly. Her impressive and beautiful voice are easily recognizable and she has been selected to sing the closing song for TV animation “Fate/Zero” which was released as her debut single called “MEMORIA” on October 19, 2011.
